Manifest.description: This type describes a manifest containing a set of requests to be fulfilled.  The manifest contains a set of stanzas, where each stanza describes a single request.
Manifest.longDescription: This type shall describe a manifest containing a set of requests to be fulfilled.

title: #Manifest
